name: ReviveX UV Protectant 4oz
description: Think of it as sunscreen and aloe for your stuff. Not only does it protect against UV damage, it replaces lost plasticizers, rejuvenates materials and restores colours. Spritz it on dry suit seals, kayaks, paddleboards, or other outdoor toys.Conditions and protects synthetic and natural materials, including plastic, vinyl, rubber, PVC, leather, fibreglass, Hypalon® and more.Makes cleaning easier.Nontoxic, biodegradable, non-flammable.Contains 118ml.
